metadata.title: CVE-2021-45483 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In WebKitGTK before 2.32.4, there is a use-after-free inWebCore::Frame::page, a different vulnerability than CVE-2021-30889.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
